dmca.title: TheScripts.com objects to alleged copying
dmca.body:
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
Copyright Infringement Notice

Summary:
Devtutors.com has blatantly stolen content from a website that we own, thescripts.com. Thescripts.com has been online since 1998. Content and site ownership proof can be viewed at any whois registrar and archive.org. 18 original articles have been stolen by the individuals running devtutors.com.

Required Information
1. Identify infringed works and material that is infringing copyrights.
a. The following thescripts.com articles were found on devtutors.com. Full blatant copies. Under each original URL from thescripts.com you will find the corresponding copyright infringement URL.

i. http://www.thescripts.com/serversidescripting/tutorials/aspbasics/ 
1. http://www.devtutors.com/tutorial/asp-basics
